[![Multi-Modality](agorabanner.png)](https://discord.gg/qUtxnK2NMf)

# Neo Sapiens


## install
`$ pip install -U swarms neo-sapiens`


## usage
```python
from neo_sapiens import run_swarm

# Run the swarm
out = run_swarm("Create a self-driving car system using a team of AI agents")
print(out)
```
